entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
